TODO
====

This project is still a work in progress. Thus, many features have not been 
implemented yet or need to be reworked at some point. You'll find the list of 
TODOs loosely listed below. Feel free to 
`open an issue on GitHub <https://github.com/Timtam/Bass4Py/issues>`_ if you 
feel inspired or want to leave a comment upon one of the things mentioned here.

.. todolist::
